title: Quarkus 3.0.0.CR1 released
content: It is our pleasure to announce the availability of Quarkus 3.0.0.CR1. We are working full steam on polishing Quarkus 3.0 so please try it with your applications and report any problem to us by creating a GitHub issue. To upgrade your application to Quarkus 3.0, see the instructions below. Among...
